subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In his first game since 2008, Plaxico Burress caught 3 passes for 66 yards, including a diving 26-yard touchdown catch in the corner of the end zone with 58 seconds remaining in the first half.
snippet: In his first game since 2008, Plaxico Burress caught 3 passes for 66 yards, including a diving 26-yard touchdown catch in the corner of the end zone with 58 seconds remaining in the first half.
